name: Jira Software
description: Jira Software is a project management tool used by agile teams to plan, track, and manage software development. It helps streamline workflows and improve team collaboration.

name: Microsoft
description: Microsoft is a global leader in software, services, devices, and solutions. They are best known for products like Windows, Office, and their Azure cloud platform.

name: Spotify
description: Spotify is a popular music streaming service offering a wide range of songs, podcasts, and playlists, personalized to user preferences.

name: Apple Inc.
description: Apple Inc. is a leading technology company, known for innovative products like the iPhone, Mac computers, Apple Watch, and its range of software and services.
